title: This high-tech sippy cup at CES 2026 could prevent your kid from needing ear tubes
contentSnippet: Earflo is a medical device cleverly designed as a sippy cup - and early studies show it led to a nearly 90% reduction in the need for ear tube surgery for certain children. It was nominated for a Best of CES award.
